Book A Demo

No more spreadsheets! Focus more time on selling.

  • Automatically track emails, calls, and meetings
  • Act speedily, gain intelligence, and personalize your every transaction
  • Have insightful and customized reports and dashboards
  • Collect and sync key info right from your inbox
  • Get a clear, immediate, and customizable view of all your sales details
  • Make deep analysis on the go and grow your business like never before
Enquire Now

Salesforce Authorised
Reseller & Implementation Partner

Advisory & Guidance

We help you in choosing right solution as per the business need. Our consultants understands unique requirements of each business and help you in deciding the best solution that fit in your needs to the fullest.

CRM Integration Support

We help businesses with custom Salesforce CRM integrations. We are an authorised Salesforce integration and support partner with more than 12+ years of experience in Salesforce implementation.

Support & Maintenance

Our service area doesn’t end just at integration as we provide continuous support and maintenance services to business even after successful integration to ensure zero downtime with higher productivity. 

Book A Demo
PRICES STARTING AS LOW AS RS 2000/MONTH

Niche Solutions To Fill The Gap

Sales Cloud

Salesforce Sales Cloud is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform designed to support sales, marketing and customer support

Service Cloud

Salesforce Service Cloud is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform for customer service and support

Pardot

Pardot is a software as a service marketing automation platform by SalesForce offering email automation, targeted email campaigns and lead management for B2B sales and marketing organizations.

Revenue Cloud (CPQ)

Speed up your growth with Salesforce Revenue Cloud. Bring CPQ software and Billing together for one powerful revenue management tool.

Experience Cloud

Built on the Salesforce platform, Experience Cloud is a digital platform that helps companies build connected CRM-powered digital experiences

Commerce Cloud

Commerce Cloud is a key part of the Salesforce Customer Success Platform and offers ecommerce solutions for B2C (business to consumer) and B2B (business to business) customers

Platform

Salesforce Platform is a unified service that provides developers with the ability to build and deploy cloud-based apps

Integration

Salesforce integration is the process of merging the data and functionality of Salesforce with another application to provide users with a single unified experience

Field Service Lightning

Salesforce Field Service Lightning delivers faster, smarter, more personalised service from the phone to the field – all on one platform.

ABOUT TECHABLED

Your Business Growth Is Our Aim

Techabled Consulting is a Salesforce Consulting Partner focused on the client. We create and implement cloud-based solutions that help you accelerate , automate, and optimize your business operations efficiently. We have expertise in all major sectors and business activities.

Ideation to reality

Process we follow

Consider if your company is understaffed to meet the needs of its customers or overstaffed to meet the needs of its current customers. Do you believe you could increase your business and revenue in any of the scenarios above? No, it does not. To achieve the best outcomes, you will require an adequate number of manpower that are experts in your company industry.

Our slogan at Techabled Consulting is “the right solution in a precise personalized method that matches your company demands!”

Discover More

Understanding The Business

We understand from you and your existing systems about your business and its functioning.

Find Gap & Apt Solution

Based on our research and expertise we provide you the right and apt solution.

Development & Implementation

Developing and implementing a custom solution to accelerate the growth of your business.

24/7 Support Post Implementation

Ensuring round the clock support and maintenance for the delivered solution.

Testimonial

What they say about us.

A deep understanding of Salesforce and familiarity with business processes helped us set clear goals for using Salesforce to meet our business growth plans. Professional , timely delivery, active communication and caring attitude made Salesforce implementation one of our company's most successful projects!

Anthony J Elliott BioNight, USA

Techabled technical competence, vast experience of integrations and practical solutions for complex problems have surprised us! They came in as a problem solver when solution was not in sight and turned the situation in just few days and instilled confidence in business

Mukhul Dutt Design India

We started interacting with Techabled after evaluating with at least seven other Salesforce implementing agencies and we could connect from the beginning. The approach of Techabled team to understand our business was very simple and it generated a lot of confidence in us. The training provided during implementation was sufficient for our entire team members.
